title: The Joy of Ornament
medium: Portfolio of 17 etching and aquatints (six with drypoint) and three drypoints (two with aquatint)
dimensions: plate (each approx.): 9 × 4 1/16" (22.8 × 10.3 cm); sheet (each approx.): 11 7/16 × 6" (29 × 15.3 cm)
